td.content: s:pt describes recurrent Kidney over the past month. pt is a 50 yo female net maker. o:Height 63 in, Weight 109 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 14 a:Chronic Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Lisinopril - 20 mg daily, and ordered Abdominal CT Scan.

s:a 51 yr old f complains of Kidney for 10 days. NKDA.
